condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Operations Support to Programme Delivery

description.narrative: The Sri Lanka Country Office (SLCO) Operations Unit continued to provide quality and timely services, both in response to the COVID-19 emergency and regular programmes. During the year, extensive support was provided in processing millions worth of supplies/contractual services and in ICT, particularly technology for development. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:31/01/2022
